title: President travels to Kilinochchi by Yal Devi with the message of goodwill
content: The train service on the reconstructed Northern railway line began operations from Omanthai to Kilinochchi, after 23 years Saturday (14). Sri Lanka President Mahinda Rajapaksa launched the ‘Yal Devi’ train service  that departed from Omanthai, travelling as the first passenger   and arrived in  the former LTTE strong-hold, Kilinochchi….
